I am making this post also so if I get it fixed, others that are looking for help on this topic will find their answer aswell.

But that would imply that you looked for earlier threads yourself, or you're somehow convinced you're the first one to ever try and create one in KSP.

If you go into advanced search and type in 'shuttle' and 'only search thread titles' or whatever, you'll find tons and tons of threads pretty much identical to this.
Pictures would be nice. We can't help you if we have no information about it.
